meanings.definition: A person who owns and manages a business or property.
meanings.sent1: The proprietors of the store were responsible for its success.
meanings.sent2: The proprietors of the hotel greeted guests with warm smiles.
meanings.sent3: The proprietors of the farm decided to have a dance party for the cows.
meanings.sent4: The proprietors of the restaurant held the secret recipe close to their chests.
meanings.sent5: The proprietors of the bakery woke up early to prepare fresh pastries for the customers.

meanings.definition: The owner of a particular item or piece of land.
meanings.sent1: The proprietors of the antique shop displayed their collection with pride.
meanings.sent2: The proprietors of the house decided to renovate the garden.
meanings.sent3: The proprietors of the car wash found a hidden treasure under the soap suds.
meanings.sent4: The proprietors of the beachfront property enjoyed the sound of crashing waves.
meanings.sent5: The proprietors of the bookstore organized a book signing event for local authors.
